name: RadioButton
description: A Radio Button component, should be wrapped with a RadioGroup

props.name: value
props.description: The identifier value of the radio button. must be different than other RadioButtons in the same group

props.name: selected
props.description: When using RadioButton without a RadioGroup, use this prop to toggle selection

props.name: disabled
props.description: Whether the radio button should be disabled

props.name: color
props.description: The color of the radio button

props.name: size
props.description: The size of the radio button, affect both width & height

props.name: label
props.description: A label for the radio button description

props.name: iconOnRight
props.description: Should the icon be on the right side of the label

props.name: contentOnRight
props.description: Should the content be rendered right to the button
